recipes.name: Classic Margherita Pizza
recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F. Roll out dough, spread sauce, add cheese, bake for 12-15 minutes, top with fresh basil.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Slice chicken and vegetables. Stir-fry chicken until cooked, add vegetables, sauce, and seasonings. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: Cream butter and sugars, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients, fold in chocolate chips. Bake at 375°F for 9-11 minutes.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. Cook pancetta and garlic, add egg yolks and parmesan. Mix with spaghetti and serve.

recipes.name: Beef and Broccoli
recipes.instructions: Slice beef and vegetables. Stir-fry beef until cooked, add vegetables, sauce, and seasonings. Cook until vegetables are tender-crisp.

recipes.name: Pasta Carbonara
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. Cook pancetta and garlic, add egg yolks and parmesan. Mix with pasta and serve.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
recipes.instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add vegetables and curry powder, then coconut milk and broth. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
recipes.instructions: Chop vegetables and combine with olives and feta. Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano for dressing. Toss and serve.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
recipes.instructions: Brown beef and add taco seasoning. Warm tortillas. Assemble tacos with beef and toppings.

recipes.name: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.instructions: Sauté mushrooms, onion, and garlic. Add rice and wine. Gradually add hot broth, stirring constantly. Finish with butter and parmesan.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
recipes.instructions: Mash bananas and mix with melted butter. Add remaining ingredients and mix. Bake at 350°F for 60 minutes.

recipes.name: Lemon Garlic Salmon
recipes.instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper. Sear in olive oil. Add butter, garlic, and lemon juice. Bake until cooked through.

recipes.name: Vegetable Lasagna
recipes.instructions: Layer noodles with vegetables, cheeses, and sauce. Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes covered, then 15 minutes uncovered.

recipes.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.instructions: Simmer chicken in broth until cooked. Remove and shred. Cook vegetables in broth, add noodles and chicken. Season and serve.

recipes.name: Beef Stir Fry
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry beef until browned. Add vegetables and cook until tender-crisp. Add sauce ingredients and simmer briefly. Serve over rice.

recipes.name: Blueberry Pancakes
recipes.instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients and stir until just combined. Fold in blueberries. Cook on a griddle until golden brown.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
recipes.instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange with basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Beef Stroganoff
recipes.instructions: Brown beef. Sauté mushrooms and onions. Make a roux with butter and flour, add broth. Combine with beef and vegetables, stir in sour cream. Serve over noodles.

recipes.name: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.instructions: Slice eggplant, dredge in flour, dip in egg, coat in breadcrumbs. Fry until golden. Layer with sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Soup
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic. Add pumpkin and broth. Simmer until soft. Blend until smooth. Add cream and spices. Heat through and serve.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté shrimp with garlic, add wine and lemon juice. Stir in butter and seasonings. Toss with pasta and serve.

recipes.name: Chickpea Curry
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger. Add spices, tomatoes, and chickpeas. Simmer with coconut milk until flavors meld. Serve over rice.

recipes.name: French Toast
recipes.instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla. Dip bread slices and cook in butter until golden brown. Top with syrup and powdered sugar.

recipes.name: Fish Tacos
recipes.instructions: Season and cook fish. Warm tortillas. Prepare slaw with cabbage, lime, and cilantro. Assemble tacos with fish, slaw, avocado, and sour cream.

recipes.name: Beef Stew
recipes.instructions: Brown beef. Add vegetables and sauté. Stir in flour, then broth and seasonings. Simmer until meat is tender and vegetables are cooked.

recipes.name: Spinach and Feta Stuffed Chicken
recipes.instructions: Cut pockets in chicken breasts. Mix spinach, feta, and seasonings. Stuff chicken and secure with toothpicks. Bake until chicken is cooked through.

recipes.name: Apple Crisp
recipes.instructions: Slice apples and toss with lemon juice. Mix remaining ingredients for topping. Place apples in dish, cover with topping. Bake until golden and bubbly.

recipes.name: Pad Thai
recipes.instructions: Soak noodles. Stir-fry chicken, add garlic and eggs. Add noodles and sauce mixture. Toss with bean sprouts and green onions. Garnish with peanuts and lime.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
recipes.instructions: Cook quinoa and cool. Chop vegetables. Combine all ingredients with dressing of olive oil, lemon juice, and oregano.

recipes.name: Chicken Enchiladas
recipes.instructions: Cook and shred chicken. Sauté vegetables. Mix with chicken and some sauce. Roll in tortillas, top with remaining sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

recipes.name: Falafel
recipes.instructions: Process chickpeas, herbs, and spices. Form into balls, refrigerate for 1 hour. Fry until golden brown. Serve with pita and tahini sauce.

recipes.name: Tomato Basil Soup
recipes.instructions: Sauté onion and garlic. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer until tomatoes break down. Blend with basil. Add cream and seasonings.

recipes.name: Teriyaki Salmon
recipes.instructions: Marinate salmon in teriyaki mixture. Bake or grill until cooked through. Garnish with sesame seeds and green onions. Serve over rice.

recipes.name: Black Bean Burgers
recipes.instructions: Mash beans. Mix with sautéed vegetables, breadcrumbs, egg, and spices. Form patties and cook until crispy outside. Serve on buns with toppings.

recipes.name: Tiramisu
recipes.instructions: Beat egg yolks with sugar, add mascarpone. Whip egg whites and fold in. Dip ladyfingers in coffee and layer with cream mixture. Dust with cocoa powder.

recipes.name: Roast Chicken
recipes.instructions: Rub chicken with butter, herbs, and seasonings. Stuff cavity with lemon, garlic, and onion. Roast until internal temperature reaches 165°F.

recipes.name: Guacamole
recipes.instructions: Mash avocados with lime juice. Fold in diced onion, tomato, cilantro, and jalapeño. Season with garlic and salt to taste.

recipes.name: Pho
recipes.instructions: Simmer bones with spices for broth. Cook noodles separately. Place noodles in bowl with raw beef slices, pour hot broth over. Serve with garnishes.

recipes.name: Cauliflower Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Pulse cauliflower into rice-sized pieces. Scramble eggs, set aside. Stir-fry vegetables, add cauliflower rice and seasonings. Return eggs and mix.

recipes.name: Strawberry Shortcake
recipes.instructions: Macerate strawberries with sugar. Make biscuits with flour, baking powder, salt, butter, and eggs. Split biscuits, layer with berries and whipped cream.

recipes.name: FOOD FOOD
recipes.instructions: test
